thread.title_full: MP investigates potential supply of cash to deputies to approve finances enlargement – 2024-06-13 21:58:43

author: archyde
title: MP investigates potential supply of cash to deputies to approve finances enlargement – 2024-06-13 21:58:43
text:
He Public ministry informs that they’re carried out proceedings for an investigation about potential presents of cash to deputies .
The investigation is carried out by Anti-Corruption Prosecutor’s Workplace and carries out proceedings within the Ministry of Public Funds.
That is an investigation initiated by commerce ” on April 23, 2024, resulting from “the potential inventory fee that would fall below crimes of authority abuse y lively bribery ”.
In response to the MP, cash was provided to deputies in change for vote in favor of a finances enlargement proposal .
The Public Ministry “seeks to gather documentary info that contribute to strengthening analysis ”, he detailed.
“The investigation derives from info by way of which the potential supply of cash to deputies was identified, in change for voting in favor of a finances enlargement proposal,” defined the MP.
The investigation derives from info by way of which the potential supply of cash to deputies was identified, in change for voting in favor of a finances enlargement proposal.
By means of the diligence we search to gather documentary info that… pic.twitter.com/XK9WQKw84J
— MP of Guatemala (@MPguatemala) June 11, 2024
Finance speaks out The Ministry of Public Finance issued an announcement indicating that Public Ministry personnel arrived on the establishment’s headquarters and “requested the customer entry report guide, in addition to photos from surveillance cameras at degree 18, the place the proprietor “Jonathan Menkos carries out his day by day duties.”
Additionally it is indicated that the Public Ministry didn’t specify the rationale for the investigation or the names of the folks being investigated.
“Due to the above, the MP workers was informed that the Minister of Finance enjoys the proper of pre-trial that the general public workplace entails, by advantage of which they had been reminded that authorized investigations are generated by a grievance or grievance filed earlier than a reliable choose, the place the fee of an act or reality constituting a criminal offense is recorded and never for spurious, political or illegitimate causes,” it was added.
In response to Finance, MP workers had been “invited” to go away the scene and don’t rule out taking authorized motion.
It was added that the establishment is “prepared to collaborate with the investigations of the Public Ministry, so long as they’re carried out inside the authorized framework.”
#MinfinSaleAdelante | The Ministry of Public Finance informs that the Minister of Public Finance, Jonathan Menkos Zeissig @jmenkos enjoys the proper of pretrial. @GuatemalaGob @SCSPGT @AGN_noticias @Radio_TGW @BArevalodeLeon pic.twitter.com/IAuSrFyuAW
— Ministry of Public Finance (@MinfinGT) June 11, 2024
#investigates #supply #cash #deputies #approve #finances #enlargement
